name: Steve Long
visual_prompt: Steve, unmistakably tall and broad-shouldered. His eyes peer through the round, scholarly lenses of his glasses, and shaved blonde hair, wearing a black baseball cap. The cap and his shirt, dotted with vibrant celestial patterns, lend an air of cosmic presence, as if the stars themselves had chosen to accompany him on this night.
backstory: Role: Singer of opera, and teacher of voice. Trait: Gregarious, and empathetic. Secret: I'm Jewish.
